text: John D'Aquino (born April 14, 1958)https://www2.1movies.is/celebrity/john- daquino-77382 is an American film and television actor, best known for his role as Lieutenant Benjamin Krieg in seaQuest DSV, Joel in the film Pumpkinhead and U.S. President Richard Martinez in the Disney Channel Original Series Cory in the House. In 1985 he co-starred as Varges de la Cosa in the western series Wildside. He has made guest appearances on Baywatch, Magnum P.I., Matlock, Melrose Place, Murder, She Wrote, Seinfeld, Sliders, Quantum Leap, Xena: Warrior Princess, Crossing Jordan, Hannah Montana, Monk, Shake It Up, Lois and Clark: The New Adventures of Superman and had recurring roles on 3rd Rock from the Sun, JAG, and co-starred in Comedy Central's That's My Bush! as Larry O'Shea. ==References== ==External links== * John D'Aquino's Young Actors Workshop * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:20th- century American male actors Category:21st-century American male actors Category:Male actors from New York City Category:American male film actors Category:American male television actors Category:People from Brooklyn Category:American people of Italian descent
title: John D'Aquino
